subheading: XinFin Wallet is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with the XinFin blockchain. Our easy-to-use, open-source platform allows you to generate wallets, interact with smart contracts, and so much more.
obtainAddress: Obtain an XDC address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: Send or swap your XDC and tokens, purchase ENS domains, interact with smart contracts, and more! This is where the magic happens.
aboutSubheading: XinFin Wallet - puts the XinFin blockchain at your fingertips. We are a team of crypto-enthusiasts dedicated to bring you the most secure, most intuitive, and dare we say prettiest way to manage your XDC and ERC-20 tokens. We're always here to help, and we're never giving away ETH. Cheers!
aboutMewWalletDesc: Access the XinFin blockchain's original and most-trusted wallet client, now with a host of new features all contained in an elegant, easy-to-use interface.
aboutHardwareWalletDesc: XinFin Wallet offers support for all major hardware wallets including Ledger, Trezor, and many more.
aboutSwapDesc: XinFin Wallet has partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, XDC and BTC, XDC and ERC-20.
aboutMewConnectDesc: XinFin Wallet's companion app brings hardware-wallet style security to your iOS or Android smartphone, helping you to secure your funds as never before.
socialSubheading: Get in the know and see your balance grow (we hope)!
howToCreateWalletTitle: How do I create a new wallet?
howToCreateWalletDesc: XinFin Wallet offers three ways to create a new XDC wallet. These are via MEWconnect, Keystore file, or Mnemonic phrase. For more information, click
whatIsMewConnectDesc: MEWconnect is our companion mobile app forXinFin Wallet. We call it a hardware wallet without all the hardware. Now available for all Android and iOS smartphones! Read more
workingWOtherWalletsTitle: Can XinFin Wallet work with other wallets?
workingWOtherWalletsDesc: XinFin Wallet supports many different wallet types including hardware wallets, such as the Ledger Nano S or Trezor, and third-party wallets like MetaMask. We are also open for anyone to use their XinFin wallets with the appropriate information. Read more
howToSendTxTitle: How can I send a transaction?
howToSendTxDesc: XinFin Wallet lets anyone with a balance of XDC or ERC20 tokens send a transaction, without additional charges. Using the XinFin blockchain takes gas, which is paid for in ETH, so we recommend having at least .01 XDC to cover around 2 - 3 transactions. Read more
forgotPasswordPrivKeyTitle: I forgot my password/private key! What can I do?
forgotPasswordPrivKeyDesc: XinFin Wallet does not offer support to recover or reset passwords/private keys. We always suggest writing down private keys and passwords on physical paper/notebooks for safekeeping. Maybe you saved it on your computer! For ideas on what to look for, read more
welcomeToV5Desc1: Welcome to the brand new XinFin Wallet! If this is your first time visiting, check out our {0}.
welcomeToV5Desc2: Vintage XinFin Wallet can still be accessed {0}, or at the bottom of the page.
